attributes.action: Make the Health Visiting Service Mandatory to all Families
attributes.additional_details:
Health visitors do an exceptional job in early assessment and prevention of key public health issues and encourage early attachment and child development.
Health visitors and the service can be declined meaning that key risk assessments are not been taken to safeguard children. Therefore, it is imperative that the service should be mandatory to protect our children and help give them the best start in life.
